DOC.criteria: Healthy male female age 18 year less 55 year Body weight 50kg great Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 42.0 kg/m2 Evidence clinically significant medical condition , disorder disease Evidence hepatobiliary disease Any clinically relevant abnormal laboratory test result Evidence history alcohol substance abuse
